author: Ksa en Chiro bestuur
quote: A number of adventurous hiking trails have been put together through the collaboration of Chiro, Ksa and Walkaway. Chiro and Ksa are proud to present the drop walks that test perseverance and the ability to decipher an encrypted map.

author: Stad Gent
quote: Walkaway.com enables everyone to explore, discover and learn through interactive location-based games and treasure hunts. As well as romantic and serene walking ideas to spend time with your favourite person. In partnership with walkaway, we have put together some walks in our city. Be sure to come and try them out!

author: Formaat
quote: During the walk you can eat, drink or go to the toilet at the youth centres spread all over Flanders. We welcome you with open arms in one of our youth centres during your walk.
